title: New potato and spinach frittata
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '150 g (5½ oz) red onions, finely chopped', '1 large red pepper, chopped', '150 g (5½ oz) baby spinach leaves', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '6 spring onions, chopped', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) cooked new potatoes, sliced', '3 eggs', '4 tablespoons skimmed milk', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '2 teaspoons finely chopped fresh chives', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh flat-leaved parsley', 'Salt and black pepper', '25 g (1 oz) Parmesan cheese, finely grated', '25 g (1 oz) half-fat mature Cheddar cheese, finely grated']
